title: Can only see bottom left corner of the game.(mac)
body: So right after the latest patch(7.9), I launched a custom game to find that only the bottom left corner of the loading screen showed. The mouse would not move outside of the corner meaning I couldn't change resolution settings and command tabbing didn't seem to fix the problem. I have exited client, restarted my computer but the bug still remains. Please help.

replies.body: In case anyone has missed this so far, we're looking into this issue per the[ sticky thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/nxyEq9WA-532017-14-screen-directx-error-issues).  If you're on a Mac, tapping Alt+Enter in-game can serve as workaround by switching you to windowed mode.  Hopefully, this will help until we get a more permanent fix.  Hang tight!

GUYS! This happened to mine and my boyfriend's one too.
We usually play on fullscreen so I was playing with the in game settings (You have to drag the box down to see this part) and in the "Video" section, there's "Windowed Mode", followed by a drop down box which I changed to 'windowed' instead of 'full screen' and it worked :)
I hope it works for you guys too

EDIT: I just changed it back to fullscreen settings after setting it to windowed and it's perfectly normal now.
